description:
Chipmunk is very good at throwing walnuts into holes and says he wants a rival. Bonobono and Raccoon tell the fired-up Chipmunk about Jobo, the great rock-thrower. They set off for the river where he lives and find a small, weak-looking child sitting on the bank. Could he be Jobo?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シマリスくんのライバル
